hadith.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed Ar-Ru'aini that 'Abdullah bin Malik told him, that :'Uqbah bin 'Amir told him, that his sister vowed to walk, barefoot and bareheaded, and he mentioned that to the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) He said: "Order her to ride and to cover her head, and to fast for three days
